OOC: Sorry, I have been neglecting to post for my character.  This particular thread is solo, but I would be very happy to start somthing up interacting with other group members.

BIC:

Over the past weeks following the prison break, Celeron had made his home inside the crashed ship.  The Captain didn't seem to mind having the extra help, and Celeron could come and go as he pleased.

Celeron's room was rather small, it was eirily close to the prison block, but it was also conviently close to an emergency exit.  He dragged several work benches into his crampt room, he made sure it was well lit, and everything was well organized.  He had also comendeered a small storage room to store any extra salvage.  He had installed extra locks on the doors to both rooms, but hadn't found the materials to fasion new reinforced doors as he had hoped.

On this particular day, Celeron found himself without any projects to do.  He had rebuilt his computer, canibalizing parts from nonvital systems of the ship and salvaging and stealing the rest.  He had also made several weapon enhancements which he later found were not practical and he threw them in storage.

He decided to take a walk up to the bridge, since he hadn't spoken to anyone for about a week now...
